segments.text: Hello , Tom . I'm really glad to meet you here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm glad too . Steven , I want to tell you that I'm going to divorce my wife .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so surprised , B . Why did you decide to end your marriage suddenly ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We don't get along well with each other and fight a lot .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I didn't know that . I thought that you were happy together .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That isn't true . Actually , we have been separated for six months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't believe it . But if you both determine to divorce , I hope you will have an amicable split .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Steven . I accept your advice .
